name: Hidden Object: Adventures of Sailor Premium
name_original: Hidden Object: Adventures of Sailor Premium
description:
A long 3 years a sailor by the name of flint went in search of adventure on his ship. Arriving in the port of Marseille , flint first goes home. In your house learns the bad news about the death of his Uncle Frank. Uncle Ranka was killed on a dark night by unknown criminals. Sailor flint is required to unravel this detective

FEATURES:

- Beautiful Hidden Object Scenes
- You have to challenge the sinister mystery.
- Hint: silhouette helps you to find one of the objects.
- More 10 different levels and mini-games
